document.full_text: an ohio man who wrestled semi-professionally under the name "gansgta of love" was indicted on monday for allegedly having unprotected sex with several partners without informing them he was infected with hiv.
document.title: "gangsta of love" charged with exposing partners to hiv
lines_and_colors: an ohio man who wrestled semi-professionally under the name "gansgta of love" was indicted on monday for allegedly having unprotected sex with several partners without informing them he was infected with hiv.
